Text: Huff...huff, huff...

Oof... R-Run for it... Why...did that stupid girl...
kick my ass so hard...

I'm hurt pretty bad, too. Damnit. Let's get outa
here...we'll get ya good next time!

Humph! They were weak...is what I'd like to say,
but...I'm about to pass out.

I knew I'd be physically drained...but I had no idea
that fight would drain my magic, too...

As she watches them retreat, all the energy drains
from her muscles with a sigh of relief.
I know...I'm just an amateur...sword fighter...

I wonder who those guys were, though... Well, thugs
targeting royalty are a dime a dozen... Guess it's a
pointless question to ask.

If I'd had the strength, I would've taken one of them
prisoner and made him tell us who they were working
for...

But they said...they'd "get me next time." I'm not
sure I can take such a clich√© villain catchphrase
seriously, though...

Oh! That's right... I almost completely forgot about
him since he has no presence.
It's over, Pooch. Pooch?!
No answer.

What's your problem... I just had one of the hardest
fights of my life over here... At least answer me.

I didn't have the brain space to keep track of my
surroundings while I was fighting. I wonder where
he went?
Oh, no...did he get caught up in the fighting?

No, stop that... If that'd happened, then I would've
put my life on the line for nothing.

The only one who needs to put their life on the line
is me... I was the one they were after.

Come to think of it...what was he thinking when he
jumped in front of me and demanded they keep
their filthy hands off me?

Jeez... I never said I wanted you to protect me. It's
not the sort of thing I'd expect from you anyway.

But...when they called me an amateur...and I almost
lost my cool...that crazy stunt of his brought my
mind back into focus.
Wait...did he do that on purpose?

Heehee! Of course he didn't. No way is Pooch that
resourceful.

That's right. Running around frantically with teary
eyes suits you much better...

Oh, Pooch. Oh, Poochie, come out, come out, wherever
you aaare! If you don't come out soon, I'll leave you
behind!
No answer.

Hey...cut it out, will you? I know you're out there,
watching me. You saw me being targeted...and
you enjoyed watching it...

If you don't come out by the time I count to three,
I'll really be mad!
One...two...three...
No answer.
Oh no...did he actually get caught up in the fight?
H-Hey, there...
Cid crawls out of the alley.

You should've answered sooner! I called and called
and when you didn't answer I was so‚Äî
Worried...?

Whaaat? Please, Pooch, get over yourself. Why would I
be worried about you?

If you died, I'd have to submit a report to the
Knight Order and there'd be a lot of annoying
aftermath‚Äîthat's all I was worried about.

But...from the look of it, there's not even a scratch
on you. And...I'm glad.
Hahaha... Thanks for saving me.

If you're really thankful, then stop crawling and get
up.
I would, but...um...
Cid smiles awkwardly.

(Argh...that's right, he did say he threw his back
out. He really is a handful.)
Okay...
Alexia reluctantly reaches out to him.

...Huh? Unfortunately, I can't treat you like a lady
with my back like this.

Who said you had to treat me like a lady? Grab on.
You can use me as a crutch to get back to the dorms.
Wh-Whaaat?!
You're overreacting.
Is there a...catch?
Of course not! How rude.

Come on! Get on quick, or I'll leave you behind. You
really! Are! A pain in the butt, you know!
Th-Thanks...

There. You should've let me help you from the start.
C'mon! Hup!

Urk... yeah, you're heavy. Don't give me all your
weight.
What...?

I was just thinking...you can be surprisingly nice
sometimes.
What do you mean, "surprisingly."

The way you love food carts and try to blend in
with commoners...the kindness you show there
is surprising. It's quite different from the image
I had of you in my mind.

Hmm... And, would you mind telling me exactly what
your image of me used to be?

Let me see... Self-centered and selfish, yet you put
on airs and scam everyone around you...wh-what?!
Don't look at me like that...you're scaring me!

Well. You've made it very clear how you perceive me.
Self-centered and selfish...I see, interesting. Heehee!
W-Wait a minute! What're you doing to me?!

Huh? Why, I'm going to push you down and go home by
myself, of course.
The moment she releases him, Cid slides to the ground.
Again, my back...agh!

Well, I'm self-centered and selfish‚Äîif I'm too nice
to you, that'll shatter my image, won't it? I need to
preserve the version of myself that lives in your
mind.
My...my back...I can't walk...
No problem. Just crawl all the way back to the dorm!

Honestly! I never should have shown you any shred
of kindness!
